trans-unit.source: Specifies the mode of storing chart images.
trans-unit.target: 指定的存储的图表图像的模式。

trans-unit.source: The ImageStorageMode enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: 与使用 ImageStorageMode 枚举<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: It defines the type of storage that will be used when the chart is rendered as an image.
trans-unit.target: 它定义图表呈现为图像时将使用的存储的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> uses an HTTP handler to store images to memory or a file.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref>使用的 HTTP 处理程序来存储到内存或文件的映像。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> stores the image in a temporary file at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref>将映像存储在指定位置处的临时文件中。
